description: The Real Estate Listing Archetype - Essential properties that define a real estate listing
title: Real Estate Listing Schema

___broker.description: The brokerage firm administering the sale.

___listing_county.description: The county where the listing is located.

___agent.description: The specific agent administering the sale.

___listing_date.description: Date and time the real estate listing was published in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___property_area.description: The area of the property in acres

___home_area.description: The area of the home in square feet

___listing_neighborhood.description: The neighborhood where the listing is located.

___created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

___price.description: Real estate price in cents as an integer (whole number)

___description.description: Description of the real estate listing

____id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

___open_house_date.description: Date and time open house showings occur in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___property_type.description: The specific type of property the listing can be categorized as.

___updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___listing_region.description: The general region where the listing is located.  Can be a US state, or a province, for instance.

___tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record

___listing_address.description:
To add multiple address lines, use 
. For example, 1234 Glücklichkeit Straße
Hinterhaus 5. Etage li.

___built.description: Date and time the real estate listing was published in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___style.description: The architectural style of the listing.

___primary_image_archetype.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the primary image of this real estate listing
